subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Upton gave Atlanta the lead with a sixth-inning grand slam as the Braves finally unveiled their full-strength lineup and beat the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 8-5, on Friday.
snippet: Justin Upton gave Atlanta the lead with a sixth-inning grand slam as the Braves finally unveiled their full-strength lineup and beat the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 8-5, on Friday.
